title: Agrawas
author: Agrawas
content: LOT 1: 2018 .1 BTC Brass Lealana Serial - 2058(Full BTC address NOT available)STARTING BID: 0.000BTCLOT 2: 2018 .1 BTC Brass Lealana  Serial - 2060(Full BTC address NOT available)STARTING BID: 0.000BTCLOT 3: 2015 Original Sealed Roll of Bitcoin Penny(signed by BCP)These is one of the original rolls of Bitcoin Pennys where BG helped out with the paper packaging of the rolls in 2015.STARTING BID: 0.000BTCHere are the High resolution pics for the roll and coins. https://imgur.com/a/5zKbhzNSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: Dec 21st, 2023, 17:00:00 EST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: BTC - bc1q8kqwgn6jwsyrw898ec603n79qgyaz3rgjtrxgg SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
